#summary This wiki describe the GeneBank module

= !GeneBank =

The *!GeneBank* module is base on the [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genbank GeneBank] data source. The next figure shows the relational schema for the *!GeneBank* module. This module can handled any database using the [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Sitemap/samplerecord.html GeneBank] file format. The non-connected tables are temporal tables used during the insertion process. 

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/GeneBank.png

The tables on this module are linked to the [GeneRS Gene] module to gives a complete relationship between the DNA sequences and the Gene information. 

The user have to be careful using this module because it could require a big amount of storage space inside the MySQL server.
